name: AnimationRepeatMode
desc: Options that determine whether an animation replays after completion.

items.name: case `repeat`
items.desc: A mode that restarts the animation after it completes.

items.name: case cumulative
items.desc: A mode that repeats indefinitely and begins each repetition by setting the animated property to the ending value of the previous repetition.

items.name: case autoReverse
items.desc: A mode that reverses the animation after reaching the end or the beginning.

items.name: case none
items.desc: An option that determines the animation doesn't repeat.

items.name: static func == (AnimationRepeatMode, AnimationRepeatMode) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two repeat modes are equal.

items.name: static func != (AnimationRepeatMode, AnimationRepeatMode) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two repeat modes aren't equal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of a value by feeding them into the given hasher.
